content: august 2017 update - i have amended the pattern so that little weebee more closely resembles his/her older sibling i hope you like the updated version of this little cutie little weebee works up fast so makes a fantastic last minute gift or stocking filler made using aran weight yarn and a 3mm hook and with my personal gauge little weebee stands at just under 5 inches tall made from the toes to the top of the head in one go only the arms need sewing on other yarn weights and hooks can of course be used to create smaller or larger dolls the following free clothing patterns are available for little weebee bubble hem dress 1 removable mermaid tail 2 trousers 3 to make a top to go with these you can use the bodice from the above bubble hem dress the following paid patterns are also available wardrobe essentials part one 4 contains 12 items of clothing & a hair cap wardrobe essentials part two 5 contains 12 items of clothing & a hair cap you can find my all of my weebee dolls and outfit patterns in my ravelry store here 6 weebee is named after my youngest niece phoebe - when she was first born my daughter and phoebe s older sister couldn t say her name properly yet and she has been nicknamed weebee ever since little weebee has the original weebee s trademark qualities a wonderfully large head shaped feet hands with thumbs a lovely round tummy and bottom - you ll fall in love with little weebee i promise every effort has been made to ensure that this pattern is error free but i have very little time to spare i have a three year old lol so if you find any errors whatsoever in this pattern please do not hesitate to contact me and i will amend as soon as possible i hope you have as much fun crocheting your little weebee as i had designing the pattern more patterns to come remember to share your projects with us on the weebee appreciation society facebook group 7 if you have any questions or queries about this pattern please do not hesitate to contact me privately here or on facebook text and images by laura tegg all rights reserved no pattern may be reproduced or distributed mechanically electronically or by any other means including photocopying without written permission finished products created with this pattern may be used for commercial sale design credit should be given to laura tegg when items are listed for sale 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/weebee--little-weebee-halloween-bubble-dresses 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/little-weebee-removable-mermaid-tail 3 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/weebee--little-weebee---trousers 4 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/little-weebee---wardrobe-essentials-part-one 5 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/little-weebee---wardrobe-essentials-part-two 6 http //www ravelry com/designers/laura-tegg page=1 7 https //www facebook com/groups/1590618731240406/permalink/1645480489087563/ comment_id=1645512029084409&reply_comment_id=1645741355728143&notif_t=group_comment&notif_id=1484059800064662
